description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 1d4 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The mephit exhales a 15-foot &Reference[cone]{cone} of smoldering ash. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save dex 10 format=long]] or be &Reference[blinded]{blinded} until the end of the mephit’s next turn.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Death Burst. When the mephit dies, it leaves behind a cloud of smoke that fills a 5-foot-radius &Reference[sphere]{sphere} centered on its space. The &Reference[sphere]{sphere} is heavily obscured. Wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise lasts for 1 minute.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Innate Spellcasting (1/Day). The mephit can innately cast dancing lights, requiring no &Reference[material]{material} components. Its innate spellcasting ability is &Reference[cha]{Charisma}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air for the duration. You can also combine the four lights into one glowing vaguely &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} form of Medium size. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a new spot within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light winks out if it exceeds the spell's range.

macro.name: Dancing Lights
